creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: fan-shaped ornament covered with relief designs which include insects, birds, floral, and foliate motifs; chain attached at top has two pair six-lobed, floral motifs -- joined(?) three pair of small rings; large ring at top
dimension: 4 5/16 x 3 5/8 x 1/2 in. (10.95 x 9.21 x 1.27 cm) (including ring)
title: Ornament, one of a pair
